Flow.description: This flow is used to create Manual HCC - Hospitalization Record

formulas.name: ErrorMessageFormula
formulas.expression: SUBSTITUTE({!ErrorMessage}, 'This error occurred when the flow tried to create records: FIELD_CUSTOM_VALIDATION_EXCEPTION: ', 'Error: ')

formulas.name: ErrorMessageFormula1
formulas.expression: SUBSTITUTE({!ErrorMessage1}, ". You can look up ExceptionCode values in the SOAP API Developer Guide.", ' ')

Flow.label: New Hospitalization Record

validationRule.errorMessage: Not more than 50 Characters are allowed.
Not more than 100 Characters are allowed.
Not more than 14 digits with 2 decimals are allowed.
Not more than 100 Characters are allowed.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_ErrorMessage2
fields.fieldText: Error: Facility Code not found.

validationRule.errorMessage: Not more than 50 Characters are allowed.
Not more than 100 Characters are allowed.
Not more than 14 digits with 2 decimals are allowed.
Not more than 100 Characters are allowed.

fields.name: ErrorMessage2
fields.fieldText: {!ErrorMessageFormula1}
